channel.title: NY RAISE Act AI Regulation
channel.description: Will NY RAISE Act require AI incident reporting by March 2026?

item.title: Will NY RAISE Act require AI incident reporting by March 2026?
item.description: New York's RAISE Act, reintroduced October 22, 2025, compels developers of generative AI models to publish safety protocols and report harmful incidents. Market resolves YES if law passes and becomes enforceable by March 2026.

resolution.rules: Market resolves YES if New York's RAISE Act passes both chambers, is signed into law, and has an effective enforcement date on or before March 31, 2026. Resolution requires official New York State legislative records or governor's signature confirmation.
